msIdentifier.repository: Ministère des Affaires étrangères, Brussels, Belgium

div1.p:
Cher ami
M. Handley, consul des E. U. est il toujours le seul agent américain au Congo.
Au cas contraitre, une petite note sur la situation me serait tres utile.
S'il y a eu changement de personne, ou augmentation du personnel consulaire américain quelles formalités ont été observés vis a vis des autorités belges de la Colonie?
La question est intéressante, p. cq. pretend que au prochain changement on demandera l'exequatur, et que ce sera sous cette que la "reconnaissance" aura lieu.
Chose curieuse pour Handley l'exequatur a été demande en Sept 1908... å M. ! qui la demande å

Dear friend
Mr. Handley, consul of the U.S. has he always been the only american agent in the Congo.
In the contrary case, a little note on the situation would be very useful to me.
If there was any change in people, or augmentation of the american consular personnel what formalities were observed face to face with the Belgian authorities of the Colony?
The question is interesting, because claims that with the next change we will ask for the exequator, and that this would be under this that the "recognition" will take place.
Something curious for Handley the exequator was demanded in Sept 1908... to Mr. ! who demanded it for
